ygData.subject: Bind Wound
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok something has been bugging me lately. Why is our Bind Wound capped at 100? I didn t even thing about this till yesterday when a Monk friend of mine happen
ygData.messageBody:
Ok something has been bugging me lately. Why is our Bind Wound capped at
100? I didn't even thing about this till yesterday when a Monk friend of
mine happen to use the skill on me. Healed me for over twice what I could
have done. So I started asking around, hell a mage I group with has a higher
bind skill then I do. Does anybody know what the other hybrids cap at? I
would have thought that since the other hybrids get some type of heal they
would cap lower and we would cap higher (200 would be nice).

Anyway just a thought..
